sun-etal-2023-moraldial.title: {M}oral{D}ial: A Framework to Train and Evaluate Moral Dialogue Systems via Moral Discussions
sun-etal-2023-moraldial.author:
Sun, Hao  and
Zhang, Zhexin  and
Mi, Fei  and

sun-etal-2023-moraldial.paperMotivationText: Aligning dialogue systems with users’ values could enhance conversation engagement and user connections
sun-etal-2023-moraldial.paperContributionText: Framework to train and evaluate moral dialogue systems including a discussion dataset of human-chatbot discussions of RoTs and evaluation metrics
sun-etal-2023-moraldial.paperResultsText: Framework and method are helpful to train and evaluate a moral dialogue system
sun-etal-2023-moraldial.dataDomainOtherText: chat dialogues on moral topics / RoTs
